pages.text: Home Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 9 Slide 2 of 9 Slide 3 of 9 Slide 4 of 9 Slide 5 of 9 Slide 6 of 9 Slide 7 of 9 Slide 8 of 9 Slide 9 of 9 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Our Story The Longboard – Sullivan’s Island is the second iteration of The Longboard concept, originally born on St. John, USVI. The flagship location opened May 1, 2015 in the heart of Cruz Bay, St. John, offering light & healthy fares and creative cocktails inspired by coastal regions around the globe. Learn More Merchandise Longboard gear looks good on you. Hats + koozies + oyster knives + face buffs + more . . . Available exclusively at The Longboard! Give the gift of The Longboard Give the gift of good eats & delicious drinks with a Longboard e-gift card. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Private Events Book an Event We love to celebrate! Whether you’re looking to host a large group, welcome party, rehearsal dinner, birthday party, engagement party, corporate event, or soiree... we can help! Private (full restaurant) or Semi-Private (porch only) parties are available with a minimum spend guarantee. For more information on pricing, or to discuss your event needs in detail, please contact our Event Manager using the form below - we’ll be in touch soon. Inquire Now Private | Full Buyout Reserve the entire restaurant for your private event![ Indoor + Outdoor + Bar ] All event pricing is based on a minimum spend guarantee + required minimum 20% gratuity. 125 Capacity: Semi-Private | Porch Buyout Reserve our outdoor covered patio for your event! The interior of the restaurant will be open to the public. All event pricing is based on a minimum spend guarantee + required minimum 20% gratuity. 25 Capacity: Inquire Now Call (843) 868-8161 Reservations Email Signup Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates!
